Series V: Personal Papers and Articles

Miscellaneous Publications: "A Folklore Theme in the King of Tars." The Philosophical Quaterly, XX, 1 (January 1941) "The Historical Background of the King of Tars," Speculum, Vol. XVI, October 1941, No. 4; "Trivet's Constance and the King of Tars, MLN May 1940; "Analisis of Imagery, PMLA Sept. 1942; "'Though this Be Madness': Insanity in the Theater" College English, Oct 1945 "Some Chaucer Allusions by Sir Edward Coke" Modern Language Notes, November 1945; "Imagery and Biography: They are of the Imagination all Compact: College English 1947; "Rugby Chapel and Exodus," Modern Language Review, April 1952
